overview:
He is a young, innovative literature and tech enthusiast who loves designing and writing. In his school, he is the editor of all english publications and has the record of being the editor-in-chief of his school’s weekly newsletter.

An expert at wordpress, he is nowadays contributing some of his time to Joystics.com where he is the chief game reviewer and business development head. He loves trying out new things and then critically analyzing them.

He is a fine public speaker and debater and has represented his school in several inter-school debates.

When he is not reading a magazine or solving an equation, he loves listening to music and is a fine singer winning three consecutive interhouse solo music awards.
